* the halls whizzed by as she kept increasing her speed, knowing that she 
was heading towards the Ark but not knowing just how little of it was 
left...if anything.
But she heard Prowls footsteps thundering behind her, a ting of annoyance 
brushing over her.
Hadn't she told him to remain behind?
She sighed, couldn't he just stay behind just once when she asked him to? 
Just once?!


Since she knew that she couldn't stop she simply increased her speed and 
headed for the back exit, her hightened scanners telling her that it was 
less then 50ft ahead.
With no time to lose she rounded the corner and spotted the door, only 
bunching her muscles to go at her fastest, lowering her head.
She had no time to wait for it to open, there wasn't enough time. She wanted 
to know what was going on and she wanted to know NOW!!

With an echoing slam she plowed into the door, literally ripping it off it's 
hinges and throwing it off several feet beyond the base.
And without even pausing pace she continued out into the tall yellow grasses 
if the plains around the base, though her bulk kept her from disappearing 
into it's depths.*

________________________IRIS

( Thanx, Yanshosh.I had forgotten.)

* Her systems were depleted, she had to say that much, but everything 
worked. However...when she had thought that it was just dark in the ruins of 
the Ark she hadn't known that all of the systems were completely 
destroyed...and there was nothing left to be able to actually call it a ship 
anymore.

But she still knew that Iron Raptor was on her way there raight at that 
moment...with Prowl in hot persuit no doubt.
But there would still be the questions to answer...and the downloading.
That was right, she would have to be downloaded back into Iron Raptors 
systems. Not only because that there was no Ark to exist in anymore, but 
also that this new beast mode was SUPPOSED to be. It wasn't a mutation, it 
was already in her systems. And she would have to teach that fem how to 
access it properly.
There would be so much to learn in so little time,and there wasa lot of work 
to be done.*
